snippet.title: Viewpoint Longplay (Neo Geo) [QHD]
snippet.description:
Developed by Sammy and published by SNK in 1992

Gorgeous-looking isometric shoot 'em up, which I guess is a more modern take on Zaxxon. My only real quibble with this one is the slow pace of the player ship and fact the viewpoint (pun intended) can make it difficult to navigate some of the tighter aspects of the levels.

Chapters
00:00 Attract Mode
00:47 Stage 1
03:56 Stage 2
09:12 Stage 3
13:23 Stage 4
19:15 Stage 5
29:50 Stage 6
34:38 Ending
